local_intent: Perceive the cloth and execute precise approach/align to it.
assumptions: Cloth pose remains stable across short retries
Robot can reach the cloth without additional pre-positioning
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: detects and verifies visibility of the cloth, performs ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.01 and timeout 1200 as in GLOBAL_BT, and verifies arrival via IsAt.
